org.sabre.workflow

Class LinkedProcessorManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sabre.workflow.LinkedProcessorManager

  • public class LinkedProcessorManager
extends java.lang.Object
    LinkedProcessorManager can be used to register other processors with the Flow Controller of the system. This could be required when it is necessary to inject tasks into the system from processors other than the primary input processor of the system
